text: 4:8 2 Eghaghaniba 15:2; Aisaia 1:16; Sekaraia 1:3; Malakai 3:7; Jems 1:8; 1 Jon 3:3Ia Godɨn boroghɨra mangɨtɨ, a ian boroghɨra izam. Ia arazir kurabagh amir gumazamiziba, ia uan navir averiabar amightɨ da zuegh, mati gumazamiziba uan dafariba ruezɨ da bar zue. Ezɨ ia gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir pumuning itiba, nɨghnɨzir kurar ian navibar itiba, ia da atakigh.
